ownerName.description: The owner of the GitHub repository.

repoName.description: The name of the GitHub repository.

githubTokenEnvVarName.description: The name of the environment variable that contains the GitHub token.

milestoneName.description: The name of the milestone.  Can use the '${VERSION}' placeholder.

headerText.description: The header of the release notes.  Can use the `${REPONAME}`, `${RELEASETYPE}`, and  '${VERSION}' placeholders.

wordReplacements.description: The word replacements to apply to the release notes.

releaseType.description: The type of release. Example: Preview, Production, etc. (Optional)

extraInfo.description: Extra information to include at the top of the release notes below the header. (Optional)

title.description: The title of the extra info section.

text.description: The text of the extra info section.

emojisToRemoveFromTitle.description: The emojis to remove from the title of each release note item. (Optional)

issueCategoryLabelMappings.description: The mappings between categories and issues labels. (Optional)

prCategoryLabelMappings.description: The mappings between categories and pull request labels. (Optional)

ignoreLabels.description: The emojis to remove from the title of each release note item. (Optional)

firstWordReplacements.description: The word replacements to apply to the release notes. (Optional)

boldedVersions.description: Whether to bold the versions in the release notes (Optional).

italicVersions.description: Whether to italicize the versions in the release notes (Optional).

otherCategoryName.description: The name of the category for issues and pull requests that do not have a category label (Optional).
